Articles.Content:
Sometimes, when I load my ships, half of it's parts are missing it says "VesselName" in the name bar. Alsol parts list and all categories are gone...

It happens rarely, so to tell what mods is causing it I would need to play few days without each mod to find out and I haev pretty big arsenal of mods, here they are...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Do you have them installed in the KSP > Gamedata folder???? I can't read the location on the images that you have provided...

Also, have you tried to reinstall the game and reinstall the mods? And unpack them from their zips???

Do you have them installed in the KSP > Gamedata folder???? I can't read the location on the images that you have provided...

Also, have you tried to reinstall the game and reinstall the mods? And unpack them from their zips???

thy are in gme data, those were folders to store mods, so i dont need to redownload everything whn reinstalling...
I just had the same exact issue. Sad to say you might need to make a new save.
I just did a fresh install it might fix it but you may need to do a new save.

Might be something with tweakscale...

- - - Updated - - -

Might be something with tweakscale...

Cnfirmed after uninstalling TweakScale previosly corrupted ships went back to normal

Carrying some Hellfire and Hydra70 missiles Food suplies for starvingkerbal children.
